description:
It was discovered that Graphite2 mishandled specially crafted files. An
attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or
other unspecified impact.

graphite2.description: Font rendering engine for Complex Scripts

title: Graphite2 vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary:
Graphite2 could be made to crash if it opened a specially crafted
file.
